sense.def:
To dictate something
pomeni nekomu na glas nekaj govoriti, da bo tisto zapisal.

seg.quote: It took him a long time to dictate this letter.

gramGrp.pos:
VB
with
PREP
‘to’,
or
REPORT VB

sense.def:
To dictate to someone
pomeni nekomu povedati, kaj mora storiti.

seg.quote: The unions are hardly in a position to dictate to the Labour party.
Landlords can dictate their own conditions.
The law dictated that his right hand be cut off.

sense.def:
A dictate
je ukaz, ki ga moramo ubogati;

seg.quote: They obeyed the union's dictates and went on strike.
